title: Worlds Pick Em Bug
body: My worlds pick em is experiencing a bug or something where it asks me to sign in, in which I do, then I continuously asks me to sign in putting me into an endless loop of being asked to sign in and I can see my picks! Please help!

replies.body: Sounds like a cache or extension might be getting in the way.  The best way to know for sure is by clearing your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies).  I also recommend trying Incognito or another browser entirely to rule out possibilities.  Hope that helps!
